hu.vadasz.peter.knockmessenger.DataPersister.Server

Class ServerDataChangeHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.vadasz.peter.knockmessenger.DataPersister.Server.ServerDataChangeHandler

  • public class ServerDataChangeHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents an action which is fired when a user's data changed or new message arrived.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  ServerDataChangeHandler.FriendChangeListener
      This interface represents a listener which is listening for user data change.
      static interface  ServerDataChangeHandler.MessageReceivedListener
      This interface represents a listener which is listening for message arriving.
